svg.aria-label: Scanpy scRNA-seq Preprocessing and Clustering workflow diagram
svg.title: Single-Cell RNA-seq Analysis: Scanpy Preprocessing and Clustering
svg.desc: End-to-end scRNA-seq pipeline: imports count matrices, applies QC filtering, normalizes and log-transforms data, identifies highly variable genes, performs PCA and UMAP embedding, Louvain clustering, and marker gene analysis with visualization.
svg.text: Single-Cell RNA-seq: Scanpy Preprocessing and Clustering
